description:
Elevate your tee shirt. Made from Merino wool, a material known for temperature regulation and odour resistance, the Arc’Word Ionia is light, soft, breathable, and responsibly sourced. The construction wraps the wool’s fine-gauge fibres around a nylon core for added durability. The fit is streamlined and comfortable, and the articulated patterning moves with you on hikes, runs, tours, and treks.

Crafted at a Fair Trade Certified facility as part of our commitment to transition 80% of Arc’teryx products to fair trade certification by 2025.
name: Arcteryx Ionia Merino Wool Arc`Word SS - Mens
